rooms.description: A welcoming area with natural light filtering through floor-to-ceiling windows and Bohemian decorative elements, in line with Vastu's emphasis on a positive flow.

An open-plan living space featuring large floor-to-ceiling windows for ample natural light, comfortable seating areas and Bohemian decor that emphasizes free-flowing aesthetics. Incorporates Vastu guidelines by orienting towards the south-east.

Adjacent to the living room with floor-to-ceiling windows offering a view of the garden and pool area, designed in a Bohemian style featuring eclectic furnishings. Vastu principles applied for auspicious dining.

A functional kitchen space with modern amenities and natural light through windows, decorated in a Bohemian theme with vintage accents, designed following Vastu guidelines emphasizing cleanliness and positive energy flow.

Spacious master bedroom with floor-to-ceiling windows ensuring ample natural light; decorated in a Bohemian style featuring vibrant textiles. Positioned according to Vastu for maximum tranquility and privacy.
A comfortable guest room with floor-to-ceiling windows, Bohemian decor incorporating colorful patterns and natural elements, aligned with Vastu principles for harmonious energy.

Multi-functional space serving as a children's room and study area, designed with floor-to-ceiling windows to maximize natural light. Decor follows Bohemian style using vibrant colors and creative textures, with Vastu considerations for balanced energy.

Well-ventilated bathroom area integrated into the living spaces ensuring privacy, designed to incorporate natural elements while maintaining Bohemian aesthetic and proper alignment according to Vastu guidelines for auspicious water features.

openings.location: Entrance Hall, Living Room, Kitchen, Master Bedroom, Guest Bedroom, Children's Room / Study
openings.description: Large windows offering panoramic views and abundant natural light, enhancing the Bohemian ambiance.

openings.location: Between Entrance Hall and Living Room; between Dining Area and Kitchen; between Bedrooms and Bathroom
openings.description: Stylish doors complementing the overall design while ensuring smooth circulation according to Vastu principles.

rooms.description: A spacious terrace area with floor-to-ceiling windows offering panoramic views and a relaxing Bohemian outdoor living space, ideal for gatherings. Designed to include an area for relaxation and occasional poolside activities.
Adjacent to the living spaces with floor-to-ceiling windows, offering additional natural light and scenic views, designed in a Bohemian style with comfortable seating and decorative plants.

openings.location: Connecting ground floor to first floor via an elegantly designed staircase ensuring proper Vastu flow of energy and safety.
openings.description: Built with attention to detail, the staircase ensures seamless transition between levels.

rooms.description: A designated area for a swimming pool integrated into the design with natural stone finishes and ambient lighting, complementing the Bohemian style while adhering to local building norms.

openings.location: Adjacent to the swimming pool area for easy access and relaxation.
openings.description: A deck area that facilitates comfortable movement around the pool, designed with safety and style in mind.
